name: 蔡尤溪
objective: This course will cover thermodynamic first law and second law. The course will begin with thermodynamic properties, applications of the first and second law, close and open system analysis, follow with power and refrigeration cycles. System irreversibility and exergy will be introduced.
schedule:
1.　　Thermodynamic properties
2.　　Thermodynamic state analysis
3.　　Polytropic process)
4.　　First law close system
5.　　First law open system
6.　　Steady state steady flow system
7.　　Idea gas system
8.　　Second law
9.　　Midterm exam
10.　　Carnot cycle
11.　　Entropy analysis
12.　　Gibbs  function
13.　　Power cycle
14.　　Exergy analysis
15.　　Optimal analysis
16.　　Irreversibility
17.　　Second law efficiency
18.　　Final exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm and final exam each count for 40%
Class problem solving 20%
materials:
Fundamentals of thermodynamics, Wiley, 8th edition
Claus Borgnakke, Richard Edwin Sonntag
